mouse-move-on-zoom.name: Zoom Towards Cursor
mouse-move-on-zoom.description: When enabled and while holding down the CTRL key, zooming in the editor with the scroll wheel will be zoomed toward the cursor and not the center of the screen

rotate-saws-in-editor.name: Rotate Saws in Editor
rotate-saws-in-editor.description: When enabled, saws will rotate while playtesting in the editor

hide-ldm.name: Hide LDM objects
hide-ldm.description: When enabled, LDM objects will be hidden in the editor

better-scaling.name: Better Scaling UI
better-scaling.description: When enabled, adds keyboard input, absolute position and interval snapping to the scaling UI

scale-snap.name: Scale Snap
scale-snap.description: Determines by how much should object scale change when in snap mode

center-scale-on-screen.name: Center Scaling UI
center-scale-on-screen.description: When enabled, displays the scaling UI in the center of the screen, instead of displaying it above the selected object

rgb-color-input.name: RGB Color Input
rgb-color-input.description: Adds a widget that allows RGB and HEX input in color edit, color trigger and pulse trigger

editor-pulse.name: Pulse objects in editor
editor-pulse.description: When enabled, objects will pulse in the editor

smart-startpos.name: Smart StartPos
smart-startpos.description: When enabled, all StartPoses in the editor will be automatically set for you. <cr>Does not set gravity for ball and spider gamemodes.</c>

playtest-lag-fix.name: Playtest Lag Fix
playtest-lag-fix.description: When enabled, the lag when beginning a Playtest will not happen

pos-line.name: Show position line
pos-line.description: When enabled, position line will be shown in the editor

portal-lines.name: Show portal lines
portal-lines.description: When enabled, portal lines will be shown in the editor

color-gm-borders.name: Color portal borders
color-gm-borders.description: When enabled, portal lines will be colored in the editor

highlight-triggers.name: Highlight triggers
highlight-triggers.description: When enabled, activated triggers will be highlighted during playtest

dash-lines.name: Show dash orb trajectory
dash-lines.description: When enabled, dash orb trajectories will be shown in the editor

extra-object-info.name: Extra Object Info
extra-object-info.description: When enabled, will show additional object info when selected (needs "Show Object Info" to be enabled)

dynamic-object-info.name: Dynamic Object Info
dynamic-object-info.description: When enabled, will dynamically update shown object info when moving, scaling and rotating. "Extra Object Info" needs to enabled for this to work. (<cr>Might cause lag</c>)

enable-global-clipboard.name: Global Clipboard
enable-global-clipboard.description: When enabled, keeps copied objects when switching levels

show-zoom-text.name: Show Zoom Text
show-zoom-text.description: When enabled, flashes the current zoom level as text when you zoom in / out in the editor

new-color-menu.name: New Color Menu
new-color-menu.description: Changes the object color selection menu to show more channels aswell as previews for colors and special colors

show-percentage.name: Show Percentage
show-percentage.description: When enabled, flashes the current percentage in the position slider when you move around the editor

use-time-for-percentage.name: Use Time instead of Percentage
use-time-for-percentage.description: When enabled along with Show Percentage, shows the current level time in the editor instead of the percentage.

developer-mode.name: Developer Mode
developer-mode.description: Enables some features intended for developers

issues.info: Please post your issues on the <cy>BetterEdit GitHub repository</c>.
